name: Firesoul
description:
Help a living puppet  and a living flame  to escape from an abandoned building.

Hold mouse button to move the puppet, double-clic to make it jump! Carry the flame and feed it with some wood to increase it’s power! Using it for elevator deplete its energy, but you will keep it alive at any cost right?

Authors:

  • Ascalem (Graphics / Animations)
  • Griffin76 (Code / VFX Design) 
  • Terebris (Sound Design) 
  • Whim (Graphics / Level Design)
